title: Marco Pierre White Jr swerves jail after threatening maid at dad's hotel
text:

Troubled reality TV star Marco Pierre White Jr has been handed a two-year community order after threatening a maid at his celebrity dad's hotel.

The heavily tattooed Celebrity Big Brother contestant was also told to complete 250 hours of unpaid work after admitting to the unsavoury incident last month.

Swindon Magistrates Court was previously told that Pierre White Jr, 24, had verbally abused the worker at the Rudloe Hall Hotel after she caught him in a room that wasn't his.

He also admitted possession of heroin at a branch of Costa Coffee, possession of 204 Oxycodone tablets, failing to pay a £30 taxi fare and failing to pay a £34.60 food bill.

(Image: PA)

The son of chef Marco Pierre White, Pierre White Jr was also ordered to complete up to 20 rehabilitation activity days at the same court on Wednesday.

The sessions will enable him to do probation service courses.

Pierre White Jr has a troubled history with drugs.

He was said to have been addicted to heroin and spending between £50 and £60 on his habit when he was caught with the Class A substance in the coffee shop.
description: The reality TV star Marco Pierre White Jr has been handed a two-year community order
